name: @neuradex/sao
description: Stateful Agent Orchestration - methodology and library for AI agent state management

scripts.copy-templates: rm -rf templates && mkdir -p templates/.claude/sao/concepts/templates templates/claude/.claude/commands && cp -r ./concepts/README.md templates/.claude/sao/concepts/ && cp -r ./concepts/templates/* templates/.claude/sao/concepts/templates/ && cp -r ./consumers/claude/* templates/claude/.claude/commands/

author: neuradex
